title: Lynda - Color Correction in Adobe Camera Raw
description:
Lynda - Color Correction in Adobe Camera Raw

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 39m Intermediate Aug 11, 2015 | Uploaded in May 29, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Photography 
Software: Camera Raw 
Author: Taz Tally 
 
Learn the tools and best practices for measuring and correcting color in Adobe Camera Raw. Photographer and teacher Taz Tally shows how to evaluate the color, tone, brightness, and contrast of your photosâ€”by the histogram and by the numbers. Taz shows you how to accurately evaluate and adjust critical highlights and shadows. Then he'll cover correcting skin tones, performing white-balance adjustments, and warming and cooling images. Interested in improving your product photography? Learn how to perform targeted adjustments and correct poor exposure. Taz also shows how to make creative color adjustments to change the mood or add artistic touches. Some challenge videos help you to practice what you've learned along the way.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Working between Camera Raw, Photoshop, and Lightroom
	â€¢	Evaluating color
	â€¢	Identifying color casts by the numbers
	â€¢	Making white-balance adjustments
	â€¢	Setting critical highlights and shadows
	â€¢	Adjusting skin tones
	â€¢	Applying creative adjustments
	â€¢	Correcting multiple images
